title: No Hextech chest after countless S ratings
body: I got S rating this season from Yorick and Ashe but no chest. I have not been able to recive chest for a while now. I couldnt get one last season either. I got like 5 S rating with Yorick last season and nothing. I have never recived a chest for him.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it looks like you've already received chests for both Ashe and Yorick in June.  Keep in mind you can only earn once per champion per season.  More information is available on our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hope that helps clear things up!
